:mod:`rna_library.junction`
===========================

.. py:module:: rna_library.junction


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   rna_library.junction.Junction




.. class:: Junction(**kwargs)


   Bases: :py:obj:`rna_library.motif.Motif`

   .. autoapi-inheritance-diagram:: rna_library.junction.Junction
      :parts: 1
      :private-bases:

   Represents a junction of any size in an RNA structure including bulges and multi-loops.    

   .. method:: buffer(self)


   .. method:: gaps(self)


   .. method:: is_junction(self)

      If the motif is a junction or not. Overridden by child :class:`Junction()` class.

      :return: If the motif is of type :class:`Junction()`
      :rtype: :class:`bool()`
